title: Goldman Sachs | VP | Bangalore
content:
Education: B. Tech in CSE from NIT
    Years of Experience: 8 years
    Prior Experience: SMTS at VMware before layoff
    Date of the Offer: September, 2024
    Company: Goldman Sachs, AWM group
    Title/Level: VP
    Location: Bangalore
    Salary: 56 lpa including retirals(pf+gratuity)
    Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
    Stock bonus: 0
    Bonus: 16
    Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 72 lpa
    Benefits: standard GS benefits
    Other details: Had an offer from Arista with same total TC. Went with Arista as WLB is better there and hybrid office(2 days a week) while GS has 5 days from office and bad WLB.

title: Coinbase | Senior SDE | Remote (India)
content:
Education: BTech in CSE
Years of Experience: 5+ 
Prior Experience: Senior sde @ Media.net
Date of the Offer: 11th september 2024
Company: Coinbase
Title/Level: Senior SDE
Location: Remote (India)
Salary: 64.2 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 2L+
Stock bonus: $45,000 for one year
Bonus: 10% annual bonus
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 64.2 + 6.42 + 37.64 = 1.08 cr
Benefits: Wfh setup, all kinds of insurance, gym, periodicals, mobile, etc. reimbursement, Additional employer PF contribution. 
Other details: Offer accepted.

title: American Express | Engineer 3 (Band 30) | Bangalore
content:
- Education: B.E in Information Technology
- Years of Experience: 0
- Prior Experience: 6 months internship at Amazon
- Date of the Offer: 23 / 09 / 2024
- Company: American Express
- Title/Level: Engineer 3 at Band 30
- Location: Bangalore, India
- Base Salary: ₹1,200,000
- Relocation: None
- Signing Bonus: None
- Stock bonus: None
- Bonus: ₹96,000 (8% of Base Salary in case of Annual Bonus)
- Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock + Other Benefits): ₹1,383,000
- Benefits: Free food + Free cab service + Gym + Health checkups
- Other details: Tried negotiating but no change

***Note:** Hierarchy at American Express is reversed compared to many companies. It starts from Engineer 3, followed by Engineer 2, and then Engineer 1.*
